hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Musa that the Prophet(ﷺ) said:"When anyone of you passes through our masjid or our marketplace carrying arrows, let him hold them by their heads, lest he hurt any Muslims

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ كَانَ مَعَهُ سِهَامٌ فَلْيَأْخُذْ بِنِصَالِهَا
chapter.eng-name: A person who has arrows should carry them by their heads
